missing_keys_hint: Check the settings page to input your API keys and get all features working!
bookmarks_desc: Manage your categorized bookmarks. (Max. 5 categories, 10 links per category.)
api_keys_desc: Danger zone! Keep these a secret! You need to enter your API keys to enable full functionality.
quick_links_desc: Select the sites you want to appear on your new tab page.
bookmarks_error_min: Category must contain at least one valid bookmark.
weather_location_placeholder: Type your 'City, Full State Name' - eg.: Boston, Massachusetts
weather_geolocate_hint: Or instead of typing the location, you can use the button below to get your current location.
weather_err_geo: Error getting location. Please manually enter your location in the text box.
api_err_positionstack: Please enter a PositionStack API Key.
api_err_geolocation_unsupported: Your browser doesn't support geolocation. Please manually enter your location in the text box.
api_err_location_format: Failed to get formatted location information. Using latitude and longitude.
api_err_location_fetch: Error fetching location information from servers. Attempting to use latitude and longitude...
